# AnchorUpdate.Event.removed

**Case**

An event that occurs when ARKit stops tracking an anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
case removed
```

## Inspecting anchor update events

- **AnchorUpdate.Event.added**: An event that occurs when ARKit starts tracking an anchor.
- **AnchorUpdate.Event.updated**: An event that occurs when an existing anchor updates data.
